Wendy Pfeil talks about being the new executive director of the Greater Belleville Chamber of Commerce

article_metadata.news-keywords: adult day care, Joe's Place, Golden Years, Janis Stauder, Florence Gwinn, Belleville, O'Fallon, nursing homes
article_metadata.description: More families of senior citizens in need of daily supervision are turning to adult day care centers to meet their needs. That has led one metro-east woman to develop a local adult care center, which is expected to open by November.
article_metadata.title: Adult day care: The choice of a new generation in the metro-east | Belleville News-Democrat
